content: # 19sc blo work last single_crochet into both of the top 2 loops cut rc leave a decent length tail to work over in the next row ch1 turn row 5 rs continue in mc single_crochet into the top 2 loops of the first st 19sc 52 sts blo # *ch1 sk1 single_crochet* repeat * to * 16 times work over rc yarn tail in this row work your last single_crochet in the chain space before the ch2 turning chain of the previous row ch2 turn row 6 ws continue in mc single_crochet into first ch1 space *ch1 sk1 single_crochet* repeat * 52 sts to * 15 times this ends just before the sm work # 19sc blo and in the last st work single_crochet through both top loops ch1 turn row 7 11 15 19 23 27 31 35 39 43 47 51 55 59 63 67 rs repeat row 3 52 sts 71 75 79 83 87 91 95 99 103 row 8 12 16 20 24 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 ws repeat row 4 52 sts 68 72 76 80 84 88 92 96 100 104* row 9 13 17 21 25 29 33 37 41 45 49 53 57 61 65 69 rs repeat row 5 52 sts 73 77 81 85 89 93 97 101 row 10 14 18 22 26 30 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 ws repeat row 6 52 sts 70 74 78 82 86 90 94 98 102 * last row row 104 ~ move onto the joining the beanie section for all sizes 8 the sassy scrappy beanie by off the hook creative ©2025 pattern method teen / adult chain 63 in mc row 1 rs continue in mc and start in the second chain from hook single_crochet 62 sts over the next 20ch place sm marking the 20th st *ch1 sk1 single_crochet* repeat * to * 21 times ch2 turn the sm marks where the 2 sections of the beanie meet the rib section = 20 sts the main head section moss stitch = 42sts keep moving your sm up each row to keep a clear indication of where the rib section begins # indicates when to move sm up row 2 ws continue in mc single_crochet into first ch1 space *ch1 sk1 single_crochet into ch1 62 sts space* repeat * to * 20 times this ends just before the sm # work 19sc blo work a single_crochet through both top loops in the last st ch1 turn row 3 rs continue in mc single_crochet into the top 2 loops of the first st 19sc 62 sts blo # change to rc at the end of your last scblo drop mc towards the ws - do not cut mc *ch1 sk1 single_crochet* repeat * to * 21 times work your last single_crochet in the chain space before the ch2 turning chain of the previous row ch2 turn row 4
